products.name: The Lord of the Rings
products.description: One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.

products.name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
products.description: It shadows the experiences of detective Sherlock Holmes, an enigmatic genius, as he tries to unravel the mystery of each investigation he partakes in.

products.name: Around the World in 80 Days
products.description: If you had a spare 80 days, what would you do with it? Phileas Fogg and his valet Passepartout decided to use the time to circumnavigate the world.
